Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

AIL_3D_sample_exclusion

The function AIL_3D_sample_exclusion retrieves the current exclusion level of the given sample.

F32 AIL_3D_sample_exclusion(
  H3DSAMPLE S
);

In Parameters

S
indicates the sample handle to query.

Discussion

Exclusion means that the direct path of the sound is available, but the reverbations will be blocked - a sound playing outside a room, but through an open window, for example.

By default, samples are completely non-excluded.

On most providers, exclusions are emulated with the effects level control. On the EAX 3/4 provider, however, exclusions are performed in hardware and sound really nice.


Group: 3D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_3D_sample_obstruction, AIL_3D_sample_occlusion, AIL_set_3D_sample_exclusion
Related Basic Types: F32, H3DSAMPLE
